basics.name: Rodrigo do Nascimento Lopes
basics.label: Software Engineer
basics.summary:
I'm an junior software engineer and an undergraduate student of system analysis and development.
My main focus is at backend and cybersecurity development, but I'm constantly challenging myself to study other subjects.

work.name: Sec4You Cybersecurity
work.summary:
Daily tasks consisting of developing, testing and maintaining cybersecurity products like Authfy-Hub (Multi Factor Authentication Orchestration), Authfy-Risk (Risk Provider), Authfy-OTP (Multi-Factor Authenticaticator Provider), Authfy-Connect (OpenID Connect Provider).
Responsible for leading and teaching interns during the internship programme.
The tech stack consists in: `Bootstrap; Flask; SQLAlchemy; Docker; CircleCI; Linux; OpenLDAP; Multi-Factor Authentication; Risk Authentication; Oauth/OpenID`.

projects.name: OpenApp
projects.description:
React native mobile app (Relying Party) consuming Authfy-Connect (OpenID Connect Provider) with `autorization code flow`. Also consuming a protected mock service in Flask with an `user_bearer` token.
Kong API Gateway exposes the OP with a `privileged_client_bearer` token and `DDoS` protection. Also exposes the mock service with `JWT` and `introspection` validation.

projects.name: Escarificações como práticas de transformações - Relações entre ameríndios e missionários no rio Ucayali no século XVIII
projects.description:
Undergraduate research project developed during the licentiate degree .
Line of research: `Ethnology; Indigenous history; Colonial history; Amazon history`.
Funding agency and Scolarship: National Council for Scientific and Technological Development (CNPq).
